PLT_CtrlPointHouseKeepingTask Class Reference

The PLT_CtrlPointHouseKeepingTask class is used by a PLT_CtrlPoint to keep track of expired devices and autmatically renew event subscribers. More...

virtual void DoRun ()
 This method to override in derived classes is the main task loop.

Detailed Description

The PLT_CtrlPointHouseKeepingTask class is used by a PLT_CtrlPoint to keep track of expired devices and autmatically renew event subscribers.
